contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox protected area | name = Bald Knob National Wildlife Refuge | iucn_category = IV | map = USA relief | map_caption = Map of the [[United States]] | map_width = 300 | photo = | photo_caption = | photo_width = | location = [[White County, Arkansas]], [[United States]] | nearest_city = [[Bald Knob, Arkansas]] | lat_d = 35 | lat_m = 14 | lat_s = 30 | lat_NS = N | long_d = 91 | long_m = 34 | long_s = 30 | long_EW = W | region = US-AR | coords_ref = | area = {{convert|14800|acre|km2|abbr=on}} | established = 1993 | visitation_num = | visitation_year = | governing_body = [[United States Fish and Wildlife Service|U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service]] | url = http://www.fws.gov/baldknob/ }} The '''Bald Knob National Wildlife Refuge''' is a 14,800 acre (60 km²) wildlife refuge located in [[White County, Arkansas]] managed by the [[United States Fish and Wildlife Service]]. <ref>[http://www.fws.gov/baldknob/ U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service | Southeast Region | Bald Knob NWR]</ref> The Bald Knob National Wildlife Refuge was established in 1993 when the U.S. government purchased a large rice farm from the [[John Hancock Insurance|John Hancock Insurance Company]]. The refuge is located just south of [[Bald Knob, Arkansas]] and consists of 9,000 acres (36 km²) of agricultural land, 3,900 acres (16 km²) of bottomland hardwoods including [[Swamp|wetland sloughs]] and [[oxbow lake]]s, and 1,900 acres (8 km²) of reforested land.<ref>http://www.fws.gov/southeast/pubs/bldhnt.pdf</ref> The refuge is bordered by the [[Little Red River (Arkansas)|Little Red River]]. The refuge provides a protected [[Habitat (ecology)|habitat]] for [[Bird migration|migratory]] [[waterfowl]], other birds, and [[endangered species]]. Approximately 150,000 geese and 100,000 [[Northern Pintail|pintail duck]]s winter on the site annually. == References == {{reflist}} [[Category:National Wildlife Refuges in Arkansas]] [[Category:Protected areas of White County, Arkansas]] [[Category:Protected areas established in 1993]] [[Category:1993 establishments in the United States]] {{Arkansas-protected-area-stub}} {{Protected Areas of Arkansas}}
